Katerina's Invention

A dimly lit room, two men talking.  
Pyotr laughs, mocking the situation.  
Pyotr: “You’re developing her? He-he!”  

R: “I never made love to her!”  
R: “I wanted her protest, nothing more.”  

---
A brighter atmosphere, R looks serious.  
R: “Community roles transform everything.”  
Pyotr: “What a queer thing to say!”  

R: “Sofya has a beautiful character!”  
Pyotr: “And you take advantage, eh?”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The speaker defends their relationship with Sofya Semyonovna as a disinterested effort to develop her character and attract her to a new community.
